channel.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
channel.description: My cousin's username is "Daniel™" was banned for reputation abuse it says? Well... I tried to log on but am not able to because of my cousins giving 2 people rep... wth. Help? I would like to get back to moparscape. thanks. I'm new tho.

item.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Don’t know why this was kept open, but it’s pretty obvious this guy was using multiple accounts.

Locked.

Read full topic
item.source: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me

item.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I completely sympathize with you once my cousin was at my home and he went on my laptop behind my back and installed a virus using a cd-ROM he carried on him without me noticing then he opened remote control and starting RATing my PC and disabled my keyboard then he opened a message box saying to give him runescape money(here’s a pic of it happening) but i disabled my pc and did a run bootscan so i can get rid of the hack however he managed to use his waterwall and disable my fire-wall so i had to use remote controll teamvieweing from my pc to my laptop to combat his attempts to get past my pc and steal my runescape.

Read full topic

You got it wrong. The grill is a men only area, but the kitchen is for you…

She probably used photoshop to place an image of herself on a picture of a typical outdoor situation. Obviously she doesn’t show the lower parts of her legs, because this way you can’t see the shackles that are used to keep her in her domain.

item.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Steven™, post:26, topic:412541”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=513803.msg3731606#msg3731606 date=1314658012]

What puzzles me is that mscp still seems to care enough about rep to ban for a fucking raise of 2…
[/quote]And hey, as long as you’re only killing one person instead of a bunch, it’s not a big a deal like a serial murder right?

But anyway, are you saying that as long as it’s a small number, you should be allowed to create multiple accounts to rep yourself?

You mean like creating multiple accounts to bump your own topics?

We’re two different people, he only repped me in teh topic because he didn’t know how to give me rep any other way… he said sorry btw, he didn’t know it was a crime to give me rep as a welcome to MoparScape.Org…[/quote]
I love people like you who say, “I didn’t know it was a CRIME to ____” you’re just trying to make it look like you’re being harshly treated, and trying to make what you did seem like absolutely nothing.
And the mopar series of sites have been up for I believe 5 years now? You’re not the first one to pull a sob story and use the “my cousin did this” excuse.

Read full topic
item.source: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me

item.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
item.dc:creator: @Steven2 Steven™
item.description:
@Steven2 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:25, topic:412541”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=513803.msg3731552#msg3731552 date=1314656925]

What puzzles me is that mscp still seems to care enough about rep to ban for a fucking raise of 2…
[/quote]And hey, as long as you’re only killing one person instead of a bunch, it’s not a big a deal like a serial murder right?

But anyway, are you saying that as long as it’s a small number, you should be allowed to create multiple accounts to rep yourself?

You mean like creating multiple accounts to bump your own topics?[/quote]
We’re two different people, he only repped me in teh topic because he didn’t know how to give me rep any other way… he said sorry btw, he didn’t know it was a crime to give me rep as a welcome to MoparScape.Org…

Read full topic

item.title: Cousin banned from MoparScape effects me
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:7, topic:412541”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=513803.msg3730697#msg3730697 date=1314592860]

I don’t know of many cousins that share a house, use the same name suffix, never are on at the same time, and rep each other for no reason? Sounds like another lame excuse from a banned member…

Here’s the story
Some bs excuse about a family issue
They thought the suffix was cool
Only have one computer
“my cousin repped him for me i didnt do it”
Or some other sob story
[/quote]
are you trying to write a haiku?[/quote]
It depends…
Did you like it?

Steven™:

Dude, I’m poor. I live with him. He doesn’t live with me, I live with him.

CALLED IT.

Read full topic
